name: Am I a winner?
description:
I am a winner, you are a winner, we are all winners! Life is sweet. No alarm clocks, no bosses, no bullsh*t.

But is everyday great? Maybe not. That's when you need a one-of-one "You are a winner!!" NFT. With that in your collection life will be one long ride on the happy train.

How do you get it?

Buy one, or some, or a boat load of "Am I a winner?" NFTs. When the last is sold, a lucky soul is selected at random* and receives "You are a winner!!". 


* The nerdy bit:
Selection is off-chain and may take a couple of hours after the last sale, but it is provable fair: `printf "ADDRESS OF FINAL PURCHASER" | shasum -a 256 | head -c 16`. This hex is converted to decimal and then modulo 10,000 to get a number from 0 to 9999. The (N+1)ᵗʰ purchaser of "Am I a winner?" gets "You are a winner!!".

Coming next in the series is "You are great!!". We end the fun with "You are a lucky soul!!"
